title: Maya Dynamics Tutorials - 3D Buzz - 6-Lesson Training Class
description:
Course Description

3D Buzz is excited to announce the Maya Dynamics live class! This class continues right where we left off in Maya 101 and is the ideal next step for those who either participated in 101, or already possess a basic understanding of Maya. This class will demonstrate the creation of many different projects from the ground up - but with a focus on camera systems, rigid bodies, soft bodies, nCloth, particles and fluids.

The Maya Dynamics class will have a single, 2 hour, live session per week for 6 weeks. For students who can't attend live, each session will be recorded and made available for streaming on 3D Buzz.

Those who can make it to the live sessions, however, will awarded a certification of completion. The signed, digital, certificate will be provided for all students who attend at least 50% of the live sessions and turn in each homework assignment by the deadline.


Week 1 - Cameras

Create cinematic cameras
Create hand held cameras
Camera on a path
Turntables
Constrain your camera
Homework
________________________________

Week 2 - Rigid Body

Cover basics
Coin spin
Dominoes
DMM or other
Crack script
Fracture tool
Homework
_______________________________

Week 3 - Soft bodies and nCloth

Footprints in snow
Collisions
nCloth setup
Constrain nCloth
Tear nCloth
Homework
_______________________________

Week 4 - nCloth

nCloth for fluid
Problems nCloth can solve
Slag scene talk through
Homework
________________________________

Week 5 - Particles

Particles
Emit on collide
Sprites
Software renderer
Pixie dust
Homework
________________________________

Week 6 - Fluids

Fire
Water
Soup plugin for Maya
